preToolCall.message: BLOCKED: 'git reset --hard' is prohibited. This command destroyed 8 apps on Jan 14, 2026. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: 'git clean -fd' is prohibited. It permanently deletes untracked files. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: 'git checkout -- .' is prohibited. It discards all local changes. Use 'git stash' instead. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: 'git stash drop' is prohibited. It permanently loses stashed work. See AGENTS.md Rule 3b.
BLOCKED: 'git stash clear' is prohibited. It loses all stashes. See AGENTS.md Rule 3b.
BLOCKED: 'git push --force' is prohibited. It overwrites remote history. Create a new branch instead. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: 'git push -f' (force push) is prohibited. It overwrites remote history. Create a new branch instead. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: 'git rebase -i' is prohibited. Interactive rebase can lose commits. See AGENTS.md Rule 3.
BLOCKED: '--no-verify' is prohibited. Do not bypass git hooks. Fix the underlying issue instead. See AGENTS.md.
BLOCKED: SKIP_SIMPLE_GIT_HOOKS=1 is prohibited. Do not bypass git hooks. Fix the underlying issue instead. See AGENTS.md.
BLOCKED: SKIP_GIT_HOOKS=1 is prohibited. Do not bypass git hooks. Fix the underlying issue instead. See AGENTS.md.
